tips: Start with simpler features for your first BDD implementation
Include diverse stakeholders in discovery workshops
Focus on concrete examples rather than abstract requirements
Keep scenarios independent and focused on one behavior
Reuse existing step definitions when possible
Tag scenarios appropriately for organization and selective execution
Generate living documentation to keep stakeholders aligned
